title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 924.2 - Designated waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 924.2 - Designated waters

State Regulations

The Eastern Suffolk County Waters drainage basin shall be
deemed to include the following areas: (a) All land and surface water areas within

Suffolk County, State of New York, lying east of a topographical limit line and
its extensions to a point in Long Island Sound at the New York - Connecticut
state line due north of Luce Landing and to a point three miles offshore in the

Atlantic Ocean at the state boundary line and due south of Mecox Coast Guard

Station. Said topographical limit line is coterminous with the easterly limit
line of Peconic River - Flanders Bay drainage basin, and is also coterminous
with the northerly limit line of Shinnecock Bay - Mecox Bay drainage
basin. (b) All of the Eastern

Suffolk County Waters as defined in Table I included herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
924.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
